snippet.title: Snowglobe - Gameplay Trailer [VR, HTC Vive]
snippet.description:
Gameplay trailer for Snowglobe, a short virtual reality adventure game inspired by the point and click games of the past. Developed by Friend Factory, available for HTC Vive. You can find more information, as well as reviews and ratings here: https://vrgamecritic.com/game/snowglobe

Subscribe: https://gaming.youtube.com/vrgamecritic
Like: https://www.facebook.com/vrgamecritic
Follow: https://twitter.com/vrgamecritic

Visit us at: https://vrgamecritic.com
